CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Without using any additive and any post-treatment , polymer solar cells based on PSFDTBT / PC71BM demonstrated a PCE of 4.6% with a high open - circuit voltage of 0.94 V. This is the first report on spirobifluorene - based polymers applied in BHJ PSCs.

Let's think step by step.

1. Identify potential "Material Name" entities in the text.
2. Verify if they refer to materials used in the context of the paragraph.
3. Confirm the entities as "Material Name."

Step 1:

* PSFDTBT
* PC71BM
* spirobifluorene
* BHJ PSCs

Step 2:

* PSFDTBT and PC71BM are mentioned as components of polymer solar cells (PSCs), so they are materials.
* Spirobifluorene is mentioned as a part of the polymer backbone (PSFDTBT), so it is also a material.
* BHJ PSCs refer to bulk-heterojunction polymer solar cells, which are made up of different material layers, so it is not a single material but a type of device.

Step 3:

* PSFDTBT: Material Name
* PC71BM: Material Name
* Spirobifluorene: Material Name (though it is not directly mentioned as a material in this context, it is a material that forms part of another material, PSFDTBT)

So, the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are PSFDTBT, PC71BM, and spirobifluorene.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

* PSFDTBT
* PC71BM
* Spirobifluorene (though it is not directly mentioned as a material, it is a material that forms part of another material, PSFDTBT)

After removing irrelevant entities, we only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Names:

* PSFDTBT
* PC71BM

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Without using any additive and any post-treatment , polymer solar cells based on PSFDTBT / PC71BM demonstrated a PCE of 4.6% with a high open - circuit voltage of 0.94 V. This is the first report on spirobifluorene - based polymers applied in BHJ PSCs.

Let's think step by step.

1. Polymer solar cells
2. PSFDTBT
3. PC71BM
4. PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency)
5. open-circuit voltage (Voc)
6. spirobifluorene-based polymers
7. BHJ PSCs (Bulk-Heterojunction Polymer Solar Cells)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency)
2. open-circuit voltage (Voc)
3. PSFDTBT (Polymer material)
4. PC71BM (Fullerene material)

Note: I included PSFDTBT and PC71BM as they are materials used in the context of material properties.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency) |
| open-circuit voltage (Voc) |
| PSFDTBT |
| PC71BM |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Without using any additive and any post-treatment , polymer solar cells based on PSFDTBT / PC71BM demonstrated a PCE of 4.6% with a high open - circuit voltage of 0.94 V. This is the first report on spirobifluorene - based polymers applied in BHJ PSCs.

Let's think step by step.

1. "a PCE of 4.6%" - Here, "PCE" likely stands for "power conversion efficiency," which is a key performance metric for solar cells. So, "4.6%" is the value of the PCE.
2. "a high open-circuit voltage of 0.94 V" - Here, "open-circuit voltage" is a property of a solar cell, and "0.94 V" is its value.

Therefore, the "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are:

* PCE of 4.6%
* open-circuit voltage of 0.94 V
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

* 4.6%
* 0.94 V

These are the values of the material properties "PCE" and "open-circuit voltage," respectively.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
